InstructionData.Title: Metal Reagent DB
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Material DB Chip # Stores prefab hashes for all materials (metals) in the stack. # Persistent, no updating logic needed.
main: # Reset SP move sp 0
# --- Base Metals --- push HASH("Copper") push HASH("Gold") push HASH("Iron") push HASH("Lead") push HASH("Nickel") push HASH("Silicon") push HASH("Silver")
# --- Alloys --- push HASH("Constantan") push HASH("Electrum") push HASH("Invar") push HASH("Solder") push HASH("Steel")
# --- Superalloys --- push HASH("Astroloy") push HASH("Hastelloy") push HASH("Inconel") push HASH("Stellite") push HASH("Waspaloy")
# Idle forever loop: yield j loop
